title: minerjones
author: minerjones
content: Made in celebration for the 5th Anniversary of the DMD (Diamond) cryptocurrency.Was produced by user "cryptonit" and original thread can been seen here: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5117186Only 99 sets were produced and only a handful made it out into collector's hands.Sets are no longer being sold as was confirmed by the maker recently, so may be the only chance to get one of these great sets.Maker pics: https://photos.app.goo.gl/EheX5quoCjQ4EZCM8Featuring a great 3oz silver/gilt coin, the set contains these items:1x Book: DMD Diamond History 2013-20171x Wooden display box1x Silver/Gilt 3oz coin1x Ceramic engraved Diamond style cocktail/beer coaster4x Moonbit DMD Chips with a 1 DMD1x 3D-Keychain with blue light effectSTARTING BID: 0.0222BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT: 0.0002BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**END TIME: SEPTEMBER 17th, 2022, 13:00:00 PDT**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending timeIf within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the that lot from the time of that bid.PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC. A signed PGP message will be sent to winner with payment addressSHIPPING: Based on location and preference

comments.author: minerjones
comments.body: Quote from: hotdog7 on September 17, 2022, 06:54:02 PM0.0226BTCWinnerThank you for the bids and congrats to the winner

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: Shit - missed the end - congrats hotdog7!
